meta_title: Facilities Maintenance: A CFO's Guide to Profitability
meta_description: Transform facilities maintenance from a cost center into a profit driver. Our 2025 guide covers strategy, technology (CMMS, PdM), and ROI for managers.
title: Facilities Maintenance in 2025: The Strategic Playbook for Turning Costs into Profits

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Facilities Maintenance in 2025: The Strategic Playbook for Turning Costs into Profits

image_prompt: A photorealistic, professional image of a diverse team of three maintenance professionals in a modern, clean manufacturing facility. A woman with dark hair in a ponytail holds a ruggedized tablet displaying performance graphs. A man of South Asian descent stands beside her, pointing to a specific component on a large industrial machine they are analyzing. In the background, a Black man uses a handheld thermal imaging camera on the same machine. All are wearing safety glasses, high-visibility vests, and hard hats. The setting is brightly lit and organized, with other advanced machinery in soft focus in the background. The overall mood is collaborative and high-tech. No text or logos.
